rbp_internal_size.help: If default the size will be 4K*#entries/32

internal_base_address.help: If default base address is the first sector after the application code ends.

blockdevice.help: Options are default, SPIF, DATAFASH, QSPIF or FILESYSTEM. If default the block device will be choosen by the defined component

external_size.help: Size in bytes of the external block device, if default the maximum sze avalable is used.
